page.title: 06Gargrave, Village Hall.
page.content: Gargrave Village Hall was provided by the{Coulthurst Trust}and is the best village hall in the district. It houses all sorts of activities. The{ {Mens' Section}and{Ladies' Section}take it in turn to arrange a programme of interesting lectures. The{Under Fives, the{Over 60's}and the{Youth Club}meet each week. The{Pantomime Section}puts on two shows each year, and every summer a big{Art Exhibition}displays work by local artists. The babies'{clinic}is held in the hall every other week, and the{Womens {Institute}holds its monthly meeting there. Many people hire the hall for dances and other activities. To raise funds to maintain the hall a big{Summer Fair}is held each year.
